name: Furious Frigg
description:
Furious Frigg

Short action platformer, which was compiled as a very first Unity project. It was also an attempt to make a pixel perfect game. The game does not have any sound.

The game mechanic is very simple, using WSAD controls, with space being a "slash", "shoot" button.

Please leave a comment or rating if you like (or don't like) this game.
